original_text: It will happen in a short moment, when the last trumpet makes a sound. When that trumpet makes its sound, God will raise up the believers who have died. He will give them bodies that can never die. In that way, he will change all of us.
korean_text: 나팔 소리가 나매 죽은 자들이 썩지 아니할 것으로 다시 살아나고 우리도 변화되리라

sentences.original_text: It will happen in a short moment
when the last trumpet makes a sound
When that trumpet makes its sound
God will raise up the believers who have died
He will give them bodies that can never die
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 결코 죽지 않는 몸을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: In that way, he will change all of us
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 방식으로, 그는 우리 모두를 변화시키실 것입니다
